Package model.courses

Class Course

java.lang.Object
model.courses.Course
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Course extends Object implements Serializable
The purpose of this class is to store a title, a teacherList, a classOfStudents participants and a hexColor in order to create a course
See Also:
